meanings.definition: The quality of being without exception or fault.
meanings.sent1: Her unexceptionableness in following the rules made her the perfect candidate for the job.
meanings.sent2: The unexceptionableness of his work ethic was recognized by all his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The unexceptionableness of the cake's decoration made everyone at the party smile.
meanings.sent4: His unexceptionableness in keeping his promises was like a shining beacon in a sea of broken vows.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptionableness of the sunrise painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: The state of being completely acceptable or satisfactory.
meanings.sent1: The unexceptionableness of the new policy brought peace to the office.
meanings.sent2: Everyone agreed on the unexceptionableness of the decision made by the committee.
meanings.sent3: The unexceptionableness of the weather made it a perfect day for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The unexceptionableness of her singing voice was like a melody from heaven.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptionableness of the view from the mountaintop took his breath away.
